entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error XAPRAS7023: System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path \AndroidLib1\bin\Debug\net8.0-android\android-x64\AndroidLib1.dll #23382
  • [BUG] iPadOS 18 Forced TabView #23380
  • [MAUI]I9_ Scrolling-Clicking the 'Scroll to third cat' button does not respond #23379
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I8_headers and footers_DataTemplate header and footer for Vertical list page no header and footer #23378
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - The horizontal spacing should be changed but it is actually changed vertically #23377
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I9_Srolling_Snap points_ SnapPointsAlignment set to any value and the Items no change in position #23376
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout Horizontal grid for Text page is truncated #23375
    Backlog
  • A sample app stops working after the 1st run #23374
  • [MAUI]I3_Sizing & I6_Grouping-Variable size items for vertical list throw exception after scrolling #23373
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - Multiple selection failed on MacCatalyst Platform #23372
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReached on CollectionView is triggered infinitely when a ControlTemplate is set #23370
  • Assets file '... QueryEngine\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net7.0'. #23368
  • Picker regression in 8.0.60 #23367
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • Memory leak in RadioButton ControlTemplate #23199
    Backlog
  • [Spec] Provide Nullable Safe getters on ViewHandler base class #916
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixing regression in Picker behavior in 8.0.60 #23369
    community ✨

Merged

  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23328
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23384
  • Revert "[net9.0] Merge main into net9.0" #23383
  • [Windows] Make sure that `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` folder exists in unpackaged #23265
    area-essentials, community ✨

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Run UI tests per groups of categories in CI #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Crash upon resuming the app - fix #23360
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • [Binding SG] Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • [Android] RequestLayout when visibility changes (#20264) #23365
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] `LabelHandler` - remove extra (?) line #23346
    community ✨
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
    area-testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
